ing: 2 cups caffeinated pepper-type soda (such as Dr PepperÂ®)
des: "A tantalizing drink (alcoholic or not) that is both easy to make and will astound your guests."
ins: Combine ice, pina colada mix, and rum in a blender; blend until smooth, with no icy chunks, about 10 minutes. Divide between 4 glasses. Pour 1/2 cup pepper-type soda into each glass.
